ygData.subject: RE: Plane of losses
ygData.msgSnippet: well Hideaki (gm lead admin)  was doing broadcasts asking for volunteers to show up asap to go to plane of fear to do some testing.  Guess what, their
ygData.messageBody:
well Hideaki (gm lead admin) was doing broadcasts asking for volunteers to
show up asap to go to plane of fear to do some testing. Guess what, their
ressurect cloaks are broken, as everyone they ressurected did not get xp
back (said so in the broadcast) . So be warned and stay away from the plane
for now. I saw a druid that used to be 50 last week and last night after the
excursion he was 46, now if he went to POF i do not know, but he lost 4
levels somewhere somehow

Minkin
Sol Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bard [SMTP:dabard@...]
> Sent: September 15, 1999 6:24 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Plane of losses
>
> From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>
> A "gm exursion", eh? Maybe they are looking into why no one goes there
> anymore?
> :::crosses fingers:::
>
> -=B=-
